title: A Russian Affair
description: Our hero has been captured by the Russians and tortured for secret intelligence. Will his daring plan for escape work?
quote: I won’t talk! I won’t say a word!
altHero: a man in a tuxedo is strapped to a chair and screams while two men in lab coats send electric jolts to his head
alt1: a closeup of the man screaming with electricity running to his head
alt2: a very serious scientist wearing ear protection
alt3: tuxedoed man lies unconscious in a jail cell but a dog’s silhouette can be seen outside
alt4: man in a top hat escapes in a small plane with a fancy woman in tow
